title: Wear Stopwatch
summary: Suitable Stopwatch & Timer for the wearable platform
description: Suitable Stopwatch & Timer for the wearable platform.Stopwatch can work in background, has the feature 'Laps' and synchronizes with the handheld device.Background timer.This project is open source.Authors:Dmytro KhmelenkoGabriel Schlatter
descriptionHTML:
Suitable Stopwatch & Timer for the wearable platform.
Stopwatch can work in background, has the feature 'Laps' and synchronizes with the handheld device.
Background timer.

This project is open source.

Authors:
Dmytro Khmelenko
Gabriel Schlatter
comments: Nice! Just what I needed. A stopwatch with multiple splits. Syncing with the phone is a nice idea.
Missing 1 key feature The app doesn't stay awake in the background.
